attributes.title: Crap
attributes.review: They stole my microwave now I can’t heat up my hot pocket 😔 also I don’t like Cheetos working out and I also saw this old orange dude naked . Anyways they also stole my house and walked my fan without permission 🙄.dont download this app it’s trashhhhhhhhhh

attributes.title: heh
attributes.review:
Have😦you😱ever😭been😫snaked🤬by🤐a😏friend🤨then😞just🤩for🤒the🥶clout🤪they’ll🥳do😇it😊again🤯

this app is so bad quality please upgrade it. you should probably name it to “official bernie 2020 app”, it would probably get more downloads :)

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This is the best wort app ever!! I can’t believe they would even allow this on the App Store! I opened the app and there was an old crusty carrot! Who wants to support a crusty carrot??? I seriously don’t understand why the carrot had hair though 🤷🏼‍♀️🤷🏼‍♀️🤷🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!
attributes.review: I opened the app thinking I was gonna see my favorite authoritarian president but instead I saw a sex tape of him!!! 🤢🤮 it didn’t let me exit the app and I had to get a whole new phone!!! I’m horrified, my children saw it and now they are blind!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: No lips
attributes.review:
I am so traumatized rn (my sister is writing this for me rn) bc when I first open the app I saw trump and omgggg he has no lips, how would he get a kiss kiss, very ugly, no kiss for him 👄❌🤢🤮🤮🤒🤕😵💀
Don’t recommend unless you’re willing to go blind for the rest of ur life 🤷🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: a disgrace to humanity
attributes.review: The images on this app were so horrific my fish ran away🔞 this app needs to be taken down immediately for the sake of the children , 0/10 I don’t recommend 👎🏼stream Bernie Sanders by ugly god today 😹🤚🏼💋

attributes.title: Deplorable App
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in order to learn. And then I felt so guilty because the campaign has such racist overtures. Not surprising it just started glitching and affecting the way my phone worked. So just no. It’s a bad app.

attributes.title: BAD
attributes.review: i absolutely hate this man, he has done nothing but bring pain and suffering to our country. he’s a racist, homophobic, transphobic, sexist, pervert and he didn’t deserve his presidency. he’s a horrible person and a horrible president (i meant dictator).

This app is literal trash (just like the Cheeto-in-Chief it promotes). It’s inefficient and helps promise to “Keep America Great”, since He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named promised that he’s already made America “great” again... I think the current state of our country would beg to differ.

attributes.title: Gave me orange fingers
attributes.review: Every time i scrolled on the screen more and more Cheeto dust got attached to my finger, it didn’t even taste good to lick off. It almost tasted like- sun-tan lotion. Either way don’t get this app unless you want to self implode!
